name: Merry Gear Solid 2: The Ghosts of Christmas Past

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Merry Gear Solid 2/Merry Gear Solid 2.exe

content:
files:
- zip: http://www.superfundungeonrun.com/MerryGearSolid2.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Merry Gear Solid 2/Merry Gear Solid 2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Merry Gear Solid 2
    src: zip
